metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18123 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The call parameter of /lib/exe/ajax.php in DokuWiki through 2017-02-19e does not properly encode user input, which leads to a reflected file download vulnerability, and allows remote attackers to run arbitrary programs.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-18123` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dokuwiki - 0.0.20180422.a-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dokuwiki package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.0.20180422.a-2').
